name: Nineteenth Ordinary Meeting of the Contracting Parties to the Convention for the Protection of the Marine Environment and the Coastal Region of the Mediterranean and its Protocols

metadata.value: The nineteenth Ordinary Meeting of the Contracting Parties to the Barcelona Convention was held in  Athens, Greece, from 9 to 12 February 2016. The meeting included a ministerial session held on 11 February. The report of the meeting was adopted on 12 February.
Nineteenth Ordinary Meeting of the Contracting Parties to the Convention for the Protection of the Marine Environment and the Coastal Region of the Mediterranean and its Protocols

author: UNEP/MAP

name: Eighteenth Ordinary Meeting of the Contracting Parties to the Convention for the Protection of the Marine Environment and the Coastal Region of the Mediterranean and its Protocols

metadata.value: The eighteenth Ordinary Meeting of the Contracting Parties to the Barcelona Convention was held in  Istanbul, Turkey, from 3 to 6 December 2013. The meeting consisted of a preparatory segment, held on 3 and 4 December, and a high level segment, held on 5 December. The report was adopted on 6 December.
Eighteenth Ordinary Meeting of the Contracting Parties to the Convention for the Protection of the Marine Environment and the Coastal Region of the Mediterranean and its Protocols

author: UNEP/MAP

name: MED POL Focal Points Meeting, UNEP(DEPI)/MED WG.417/17

metadata.value: The MED POL Focal Points Meeting was held on 17-19 June 2015 in Attard, Malta, with a pre-session on marine litter on 16 June 2015. A joint session with REMPEC Focal Points was held on 17 June 2015 and was dedicated to the draft Offshore Protocol Action Plan and the main elements of the Integrated Monitoring and Assessment Programme for Ecological Objectives 5 (eutrophication), 9 (contaminants) and 10 (marine litter).
MED POL Focal Points Meeting, UNEP(DEPI)/MED WG.417/17
